law.catch_line: Registration Of Foreign Limited Liability Company

text.section: the name of the foreign limited liability company and, if different, the name under which it proposes to do business in the commonwealth;
the jurisdiction where such limited liability company was organized and the date of its organization;
the general character of the business the foreign limited liability company proposes to do in the commonwealth;
the address of the principal office of the foreign limited liability company;
if the foreign limited liability company has managers, the name and address of each manager;
the address of the principal office of the foreign limited liability company in the commonwealth, if any;
the name and address of its resident agent and the agentâ€™s written consent, either on the certificate or attached to it, to his appointment as agent;
if the foreign limited liability company has a specific date of dissolution, the latest date on which the foreign limited liability company is to dissolve; and

if desired, the name of one or more persons authorized to execute, acknowledge, deliver and record any recordable instrument purporting to affect an interest in real property, whether to be recorded with a registry of deeds or a district office of the land court.
